title: Shree Sadgurudev Swami Akhandanand Memorial Charitable Trust
detailsOfAchievement: 1) The trust provides free of cost education to adivasi girls from std 1st to12th.Trust provides free uniform,exercise books- 11 books of 200 pages and 5 books of 100 pages.Trust provides blanket,sholapuri,bed with lockers & a complete set to all the girls from std 6th to 12th around 650 students & we provide full set except the bed to small girls around 150 studying from std 1st to 5th. 2) The trust provides all types of dals i.e- Udad,Tuvar,Moong dal,Chana dal as well as pulses i.e- Moong,Rajma,Chole,Vatana,Choli,Akha Udad.The trust provides all these things because in these area sickleson disease is very common amongst the adivasis & that is why we serve all these things that to make them healthy and to increase their immune so they can fight with any severe disease. 3) The trust has decided to make Pakka Makaans in place of Kachha Houses.Every year we make 3 houses. 4) The place i.e the village in which our trust is situated we have taken the responsibility of this village "Barumal" i.e in marriage we give grocery required.The trust even pays 25% of the hospital bills of adivasis. Thus the trust helps adivasis in their every need.
